name: 2023 13th International Conference on Communication and Network Security
content: Publication: \* Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees. The accepted paper will be included into ICCNS 2023 Conference Proceedings. \* Special Issue - Network and Information Security: Threats, Vulnerabilities, Detection and Management, indexed within Scopus, ESCI (Web of Science), Ei Compendex, dblp, Inspec, and many other databases. Journal Rank: CiteScore - Q2 (Computer Networks and Communications)
